wikipedia_page.main: Peter Malcolm Maxey CMG (26 December 1930 - 25 October 2014) was a  British diplomat.

response: *Peter Maxey CMG (born 1930), Under Secretary at the Cabinet Office, 1978–1981, Ambassador to the German Democratic Republic, 1981–1984, and Ambassador to the United Nations, 1984–1986
